0.title: Where can I find free Parking here???
0.discussion: Hey everyone, I'm new here and I just transferred in. I don't feel like paying the cash for parking. Has anyone found places to park here, I dont mind walking around.

0.text: Yeah I don't know about all that buddy.

1.text: I had some luck parking on the street by the Millar Nicholas Library. But its a time thing. Either you find a spot or you don't

2.text: TBH just pay for the parking pass. It gonna be such a problem and parking anywhere has its perks. You can park close to your classes and not have to worry about walking all the way to your class.

3.text: Pay for the pass man. Don't give yourself more stress

1.title: Where are some good spots to kill some time between classes?
1.discussion: I got like 3 hours to kill between my classes and the library gets pretty packed. Anywhere else?

0.text: Yeah I don't know about all that buddy.

1.text: I had some luck, at the coffee shop

2.text: There's an arcade about 5 mins away from campus

3.text: I tend to spend my time just working out at the near by gym

4.text: Any reason you can't just go home?

2.title: I've been having trouble figuring out which clubs I should join, any recommendation?
2.discussion: I want to join some clubs but I have no idea which one to join, please help!!

0.text: You can try the music club if you're intrested in picking up an instrument.

1.text: If you like helping out animals, the Animal Rescue Society is the place for you

3.text: You can join GamerRoos if you just want to hang out and play games with other students

3.title: Any good spots to study?
3.discussion: I need some places to study that arn't to crowded

0.text: Well you could always try the coffee shop near by

1.text: I like going to the ramen shop thats close by

2.text: Just study at the library man

3.text: I like to go to the book store

4.title: I got a Parking Ticket where do I pay?
4.discussion: I need some places to study that arn't to crowded

0.text: You can pay online or go to the Casheirs office

1.text: I just pay online, look up UMKC parking and it should help

5.title: Beer at UMKC Basketball games??
5.discussion: Can you buy beer at UMKC basketball games?

0.text: I could be wrong but I don't think so now that the games are at Swinney.

1.text: Yes you can. Drank one tonight

6.title: Cat near Atterbury at 6:30pm today
6.discussion: I saw a cat while walking to the dining hall I grabbed some pork to give it but it was long gone, it headed towards the soccer field. Can people keep a look out to make sure the cat is okay?

0.text: Let it into the Library if you see it! There are SEVERAL people in there who would care for it.

7.title: The homeless man a umkc urban legend.
7.discussion: Any of you guys hear about the homeless man he's kinda of like a spectre who appeared sometime in late 2014 along the trolley trail and supposed lives in loose park. Have you heard the tale?

0.text: Nope. But could I bother you for a down payment on a cheeseburger?

1.text: Not sure if its the same story but I think Kc Star did a story on a guy begging around plaza and he lived in a big house in South Plaza.

8.title: Trustee scholarship
8.discussion: I was wondering if anyone would be able to help me in the trustee scholarship interview? And to help me prepare for it. Thanks in advance!

9.title: Off Campus Housing - Roomate Wanted
9.discussion:
Hi Everyone, 
 I'm new to the KC area and I'm renting a 4/1 by myself in Overland Park. I'm looking for a roommate and I thought it would be good to offer the opening to a Junior/Senior studying film or writing at UMKC.Rent would be about 725 + utilities. If you're interested send me a DM and we can chat. Thanks for reading!

0.text: Nope. But could I bother you for a down payment on a cheeseburger?

1.text: Not sure if its the same story but I think Kc Star did a story on a guy begging around plaza and he lived in a big house in South Plaza.
